h2: 이미지 비교가 쉬워졌습니다. 아래에 파일을 업로드하는 것부터 시작하십시오.
TITLE: 이미지 비교 - 사진 비교 - 안전한 이미지 키트
META: 이미지 비교를 위한 고품질 도구를 찾고 계십니까?그럼 당신은 바로 이곳에 있습니다.온라인 이미지 비교 도구는 매우 안전하고 사용자 친화적이며 매우 빠릅니다.

TEXTUAL_CONTENT.content: 이미지 비교 도구는 최고의 정확도로 이미지 차이를 알려줍니다.
귀하의 데이터는 당사 서버로 전송되지 않으며 모든 작업은 브라우저 자체에서 수행됩니다.이를 통해 사용자에게 100% 안전할 수 있습니다.
이미지 비교 도구는 거의 모든 종류의 브라우저와 장치에서 작동합니다.
이미지 비교 도구는 이해하기 매우 쉽습니다. 도구를 사용하는 데 전문가가 필요하지 않습니다.
이미지 비교 도구는 완전히 무료입니다. 한 푼도 지불하지 않고도 모든 도구를 사용할 수 있습니다.
이미지 비교 도구는 완전히 브라우저 기반이므로 장치에 추가 소프트웨어를 다운로드 할 필요가 없습니다.

HOW_TO_CONTENT.heading: 이미지 비교 방법
steps: 필요한 이미지를 업로드하거나 드롭다운 화살표를 클릭하고 비교할 Dropbox/Google 드라이브를 선택합니다.
비교할 수 있는 비교 방법을 선택합니다.
페이드 효과를 기준으로 비교하려면 페이드 옵션을 누르십시오.
슬라이더 옵션을 사용하여 비교하려면 슬라이더 옵션을 누르십시오.
정보 옵션을 눌러 정보를 기반으로 이미지를 비교합니다.
픽셀 옵션을 눌러 이미지의 픽셀을 기준으로 이미지를 비교합니다.

FAQ.question: Is it safe to allow access to my drive?
FAQ.answer: Yes, it is absolutely safe to allow and give us access to your drive. We won't be making any changes to your site and your dfiles will be safe with you.

FAQ.question: How can I upload files from my drive/dropbox?
FAQ.answer: Click on the drop down arrow and select Dropbox/Google Drive. Select the Google account from where you want to link your drive. Now you can select the files that you want to upload.

FAQ.question: What are the features offered by the image comparison feature from safeimagekit.com while comparing two images?
FAQ.answer:
The image comparison feature from safeimagekit.com offers versatile features while comparing two features. The main features include 
-	Comparison of two images on the slider basis
-	Comparison of two images based on the pixels.
-	Comparison of two images based on the information.
-	Comparison of two images based on the fade effect.
These mentioned comparison methods are basic in nature wherein they are compared and the result of their comparison is directly shown on the screen.

FAQ.question: How can we compare two images based on the slider comparison of the image comparison feature from safeimagekit.com?
FAQ.answer: The first step includes uploading the images which need a comparison. The next step is clicking on the pin named “slider” this activates the slider-based comparison. The result of their comparison is shown directly on the screen.

FAQ.question: How can we compare two images based on the pixel comparison method of the image comparison feature from safeimagekit.com?
FAQ.answer: The first step includes uploading the images which need a comparison. The next step is clicking on the pin named “pixel” this activates the pixel-based comparison. The pixels of the first image are shown on the second image, The result of their comparison is shown directly on the screen, wherein we compare the pixels of the first image over the second one

FAQ.question: How can we compare two images based on the fade effect method of the image comparison feature from safeimagekit.com?
FAQ.answer: The first step includes uploading the images which need a comparison. The next step is clicking on the pin named “fade” this activates the fade effect-based comparison. The faded structure of the first image is shown on the second image, The result of their comparison is shown directly on the screen, wherein we compare the nature of the first image over the second image.

FAQ.question: How can we compare two images based on the info stats of the images uploaded using the image comparison feature from safeimagekit.com?
FAQ.answer: The first step includes uploading of the images which need a comparison. The next step is clicking on the pin named “info” this activates the info-based comparison. The information of the first image is shown beside the second image, The result of their comparison is shown directly on the screen, wherein we compare the nature of the first image over the second image by comparing the stats of the image.

FAQ.question: How does the info-based comparison of the image comparison feature from safeimagekit.com works?
FAQ.answer: The info-based comparison of the compare image feature from safeimagekit.com works by comparing the properties of the images uploaded. These properties include the name of the image, the size of the image, the type of the image, the height of the image, the width of the image. The user can compare the images by following these properties.

FAQ.question: Can I use the compare image feature from safeimagekit.com on my Windows 8 ultimate?
FAQ.answer: Compare image feature is a versatile feature offered by safeimagekit.com which is supported by all the operating systems out there such as Windows 8, Linux, and even Ubuntu. All it takes is a device to open the extension file using the www.safeimagekit.com website and a normal internet connection to stand on. The fun fact is that it can even run on a slower internet connection.

FAQ.question: Can I use the compare image feature from safeimagekit.com on my Android device?
FAQ.answer: Yes, compare image feature from safeimagekit.com is a cross-platform based feature where the user can use this converter tool from operating systems such as Android, iOS, Windows, and Mac OS. It is independent of the operating systems used but only depends on the internet connection.

FAQ.question: Do we have to use any additional software to download the modified images after conversion using the compare image feature from safeimagekit.com?
FAQ.answer: No, the users after comparing their images by entering their respective images, after all, this feature does not provide an option to download. The result of their comparison is shown directly on the screen so that the images are compared directly. It is a browser-based converter tool that does not support or no additional software is required to download the modified image.

FAQ.question: What will happen to our progress if we refresh our browser while we are using the compare image tool from safeimagekit.com?
FAQ.answer: The compare image tool from safeimagekit.com is not connected to any server out there, so the data which the user is working on will not be stored anywhere and as a result, it will be erased instantly when the user refreshes the browser which he is working on. The image files which are being compared will also be removed after the user exits or closes the tab on which the extension page of the website is open.

FAQ.question: Can we compare the image files which are locked, using the compare image feature from safeimagekit.com?
FAQ.answer: No, we cannot upload the image file which is locked as the access to that particular image file is blocked. So, to use the compare image feature from safeimagekit.com we need to upload the image files which are not locked. But the user can check the password finder extension from safeimagekit.com which is exclusively made for unlocking image as well as image files in case the user loses his password for his locked image file.

FAQ.question: Will my uploaded image files corrupt after comparing the image files using the compare image file feature from safeimagekit.com?
FAQ.answer: No, safeimagekit.com is built with all the latest programs and security features which does not allow the uploaded image files to corrupt. So, the uploaded image files are completely safe and secured.

FAQ.question: Will my file be saved after I complete working on the image comparison tool?
FAQ.answer: No, we do not send any of your files to our servers all the operations are done on the browser itself therefore all your files are completely safe.

FAQ.question: Do I have to do any additional signup or pay extra to use the image comparison tool?
FAQ.answer: Absolutely not, our tool is completely online and does not require you to share any of your personal information with us, like email id, passwords etc. Our tool is completely free of cost.

FAQ.question: How do I communicate if I face any issues or if I want to give any suggestions?
FAQ.answer: We gladly take in any issue or suggestions offered by all the users, please contact us through our social media handles for more information. Safeimagekit.com is available on all the leading social media websites such as Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, and LinkedIn, etc.

jscdns: <Script defer data-folderName='$folderName' data-lang='$lang' data-fileName='$fileName' data-tool='$tool' src="/js/compare.js"></script>
